alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN MUSKINGUM COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Marne to Somerset. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Gratiot, Fultonham, Cannelville, Duncan Falls, East Fultonham, Drake, and Dillon State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
